settings.text: Only 2,534 total entrants registered for the Porsche Turbo draw! 31% sold with a week to go!

settings.subtitle: Current giveaway
settings.title: 1978 Porsche 930 Turbo GT2 Tribute
settings.text:
Our current giveaway is one of our all time favourites! A 1978 Porsche 930 Turbo, GT2 Tribute.

Porsche produced only 57 examples of the original 993 GT2, which were only available for sale in Europe from 1995 to 1998. Assuming you can even locate one for sale, today it would cost you somewhere in the region of $2,000,000 to put one in your garage.

The 993 GT2 was a stunner when it was unveiled. The already widened 993 Turbo bodywork was stretched thanks to the muscular looking fender flares that were fastened with exposed hardware, the wide rear end boasting a towering rear wing and the menacingly deep dish, plus the three-piece speedline wheels.

The GT2 tribute we are giving away is based on a 1978 930 Turbo, producing in the region of 500HP. It is finished in jet black which frankly is the only colour to have a GT2 in, it looks absolutely menacing and turns heads like no other.

This could be sitting in your garage soon! Grab a single entry or VIP membership package to be in the draw to WIN! Winners will be announced via live facebook stream. Giveaway is open to all Australian residents, aged 18+ and over, excluding SA.

Valued at: $205,000.

Permit Number: TP/01963

Promotion capped at 8,000 total entrants. Draw takes place on 15/12/2022 or earlier if cap is reached. The draw is guaranteed.

settings.title: cAR FEATURES
settings.text:
- 6 cylinder 3.3Ltr Turbo engine 

- Leather racing bucket seats

- Leather interior

- 4 speed manual gearbox 

- Wide body GT2 body kit

- Racing bonnet and engine clips 

- Producing in the region of 500HP 

This car could be yours for only $25.

Get your VIP membership or single entries in today.

settings.title: BECOME A VIP MEMBER
settings.description: The best part about becoming a VIP member is that is pays for itself, plus some... Mota gives you access to incredible savings and offers from over 4,000 Australian brands + retailers, offers and discounts that are not available to the general public. Once a VIP package is purchased, simply login as a member to access. VIP members receive entries into every single giveaway, your entries accumulate each month giving you the best chance to win!

settings.title: or GET YOUR ENTRIES NOW!
settings.description: Giveaway Permit Number: TP/01963O - Entry is only open to all Australian redidents, 18+ excluding South Australia. Single ticket entries are open for 1978 Porsche 930 Turbo draw only. Become a VIP member to be entered into the Porsche draw and all future draws, including our 1967 Ford Mustang Fastback giveaway. VIP members receive accumulating entries and have the best chance to win!  Porsche Turbo draw date: 15/12/2022. Mota own our giveaway cars and guarantee our draws, regardless of entry numbers. Our draws are live streamed on socials and the draws are conducted, overseen and audited by external independent scrutineers not affiliated with our company.
